author: Matthew

text: @Nuahsy As good as Evermore was, I wish we would have gotten SD3 in the west officially. That game is amazing, and if it did well, maybe the Mana series overall would have gone in a different direction to be something closer to those, rather than a place to experiment with gameplay ideas that haven't seemed to ever work as well as those first 2. :(
